CHICAGO, ILLINOIS – The Heart of Hope Foundation will host its annual Charity Gala on Saturday, September 21, 2025, at the Grand Ballroom of the Riverside Hotel in Chicago. The formal evening, beginning at 7:00 PM, will feature a silent auction, a live orchestra, and a keynote address by Dr. Maya Patel, founder of HopeTech.

The Heart of Hope Foundation invites media representatives to cover the gala and encourages interested donors to secure tickets through the organization’s website.
